1.descricao: When Bull Elephant enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return two Forests you control to their owner's hand.
1.texto: Four gray trees and a long, coiling snake. What am I? -Zhalfirin riddle

2.descricao:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate enchanted creature.
2.texto: "As you breathe your last, understand why I accept such forbidden gifts." -Purraj of Urborg

3.texto: If you find yourself and a friend being chased by a king cheetah, you have but one chance: Trip your friend. -Suq'Ata wisdom

regras.texto: King Cheetah is always a Creature spell, never an instant, regardless of when you cast it.

4.descricao: {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Necrosavant from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
4.texto: "Ah, I remember my first death." -Zarkuu, necrosavant

regras.texto: The ability is activated while this card is in the graveyard.

5.descricao:
When Ovinomancer enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return three basic lands you control to their owner's hand.

{T}, Return Ovinomancer to its owner's hand: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller puts a 0/1 green Sheep creature token onto the battlefield.

regras.texto: Can target itself. This will cause it to be returned to your hand during announcement and will result in no sheep since it will not be on the battlefield at resolution so the effect fails since it target is illegal.

6.descricao: This turn and next turn, creatures can't attack, and players and permanents can't be the targets of spells or activated abilities.
6.texto: "By the tongues of a thousand serpents, this time I do not lie." -Ahmahz il Kin, Suq'Ata diplomat

regras.texto: Can be cast after your attack.

It affects the current turn and the next turn. This could affect the same player twice if they have two turns in a row, or it could affect different players. In a multiplayer game it affects exactly two turns, not a full round of turns.
Doesn't skip the Combat Phase, just renders creatures unable to attack.
Activated abilities contain a colon. They're generally written "[Cost]

7.descricao: {B}, Sacrifice Urborg Mindsucker: Target opponent discards a card at random. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
7.texto: "My pet will pick the ripe fruit from your tortured brain as if it were hanging from a vine." -Kaervek

regras.texto: If you cast this as normal during your main phase, it will enter the battlefield and you'll receive priority. If no abilities trigger because of this, you can activate its ability immediately, before any other player has a chance to remove it from the battlefield.

8.descricao:
Enchant creature

When Vampirism enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control.

Other creatures you control get -1/-1.

9.descricao:
Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.)

At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandstalker to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)
9.texto: "Some believe sandstalkers to be illusions; those with scars know better." -Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert

regras.texto: It is returned to its owner's hand at the end of any turn in which it is on the battlefield.

10.descricao:
As an additional cost to cast Wicked Reward, sacrifice a creature.

Target creature gets +4/+2 until end of turn.
10.texto: "The blood on my hands is merely proof of my ambition." -Kaervek

regras.texto: You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.
